00077 #include "DOMPrintFilter.hpp"
00078 #include <xercesc/util/XMLUniDefs.hpp>
00079 #include <xercesc/util/XMLString.hpp>
00080 
00081 static const XMLCh  element_person[]=
00082 {
00083     chLatin_p, chLatin_e, chLatin_r, chLatin_s, chLatin_o, chLatin_n, chNull 
00084 };
00085 
00086 static const XMLCh  element_link[]=
00087 {
00088     chLatin_l, chLatin_i, chLatin_n, chLatin_k, chNull 
00089 };
00090 
00091 DOMPrintFilter::DOMPrintFilter(unsigned long whatToShow)
00092 :fWhatToShow(whatToShow)
00093 {}
00094 
00095 short DOMPrintFilter::acceptNode(const DOMNode* node) const
00096 {
00097     //
00098     // The DOMWriter shall call getWhatToShow() before calling 
00099     // acceptNode(), to show nodes which are supposed to be 
00100     // shown to this filter.
00101     // 
00102     // REVISIT: In case the DOMWriter does not follow the protocol, 
00103     //          Shall the filter honour, or NOT, what it claimes
00104     //         (when it is constructed/setWhatToShow()) 
00105     //          it is interested in ?
00106     // 
00107     // The DOMLS specs does not specify that acceptNode() shall do
00108     // this way, or not, so it is up the implementation,
00109     // to skip the code below for the sake of performance ...
00110     //
00111     if ((getWhatToShow() & (1 << (node->getNodeType() - 1))) == 0)
00112         return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_ACCEPT;
00113 
00114     switch (node->getNodeType())
00115     {
00116     case DOMNode::ELEMENT_NODE:
00117         {
00118             // for element whose name is "person", skip it
00119             if (XMLString::compareString(node->getNodeName(), element_person)==0)
00120                 return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_SKIP;
00121             // for element whose name is "line", reject it
00122             if (XMLString::compareString(node->getNodeName(), element_link)==0)
00123                 return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_REJECT;
00124             // for rest, accept it
00125             return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_ACCEPT;
00126 
00127             break;
00128         }
00129     case DOMNode::COMMENT_NODE:
00130         {
00131             // the WhatToShow will make this no effect
00132             return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_REJECT;
00133             break;
00134         }
00135     case DOMNode::TEXT_NODE:
00136         {
00137             // the WhatToShow will make this no effect
00138             return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_REJECT;
00139             break;
00140         }
00141     case DOMNode::DOCUMENT_TYPE_NODE:
00142         {
00143             // even we say we are going to process document type,
00144             // we are not able be to see this node since
00145             // DOMWriterImpl (a XercesC's default implementation
00146             // of DOMWriter) will not pass DocumentType node to
00147             // this filter.
00148             //
00149             return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_REJECT;  // no effect
00150             break;
00151         }
00152     case DOMNode::DOCUMENT_NODE:
00153         {
00154             // same as DOCUMENT_NODE
00155             return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_REJECT;  // no effect
00156             break;
00157         }
00158     default :
00159         {
00160             return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_ACCEPT;
00161             break;
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165     return DOMNodeFilter::FILTER_ACCEPT;
00166 }
